title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: Rinku presses on with his plans of expanding into a new business territory, while those against him have different agendas. Ghosh makes progress in his investigation to find Koyal and take her to safety.
